Subbed Projects.Show Name: Kami nomi zo Shiru Sekai: Megami-hen

Good Comments: Glad they left the honorifics, since they have a significant meaning, and nothing looks worse than every name being written "Doctor Kiba" and "Mister Kayaki". If I was too braindead to understand what honorifics are, I'd go watch 4Kids dubs.
